unnormalised: In a hilarious turn of events, a package addressed to "Sharma Niwas, Opp. Hanuman Mandir, Karol Bagh, Delhi, 110005" ended up in Kerala, not Delhi. The courier company, SpeedyDelivery, claimed a "slight misunderstanding" with the pin code.
normalised: In a hilarious turn of events, a package addressed to "Sharma Niwas, opposite Hanuman Mandir, Karol Bagh, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and five" ended up in Kerala, not Delhi. The courier company, S-p-e-e-d-y D-e-l-i-v-e-r-y, claimed a "slight misunderstanding" with the pin code.

unnormalised: Apparently, the delivery guy took "Opp. Hanuman Mandir" a bit too literally and figured the closest temple must be in God's Own Country. The sender, Mr. R. Kumar, said, "I specifically wrote 110005! Did they think Delhi moved south overnight?"
normalised: Apparently, the delivery guy took "opposite Hanuman Mandir" a bit too literally and figured the closest temple must be in God's Own Country. The sender, Mister R. Kumar, said, "I specifically wrote one hundred and ten thousand and five! Did they think Delhi moved south overnight?"

unnormalised: SpeedyDelivery has offered Mr. Kumar a free chai and samosa platter as compensation, along with expedited shipping. They assured him the package, containing a very urgent saree for his mother, is now "almost definitely" headed to the right 110005.
normalised: S-p-e-e-d-y D-e-l-i-v-e-r-y has offered Mister Kumar a free chai and samosa platter as compensation, along with expedited shipping. They assured him the package, containing a very urgent saree for his mother, is now "almost definitely" headed to the right one hundred and ten thousand and five.

unnormalised: We can only hope Mrs. Kumar receives her saree before Diwali, or else SpeedyDelivery might need a new address themselves – preferably one far, far away from Karol Bagh. And maybe a geography lesson for their staff wouldn't hurt either!
normalised: We can only hope Missus Kumar receives her saree before Diwali, or else S-p-e-e-d-y D-e-l-i-v-e-r-y might need a new address themselves – preferably one far, far away from Karol Bagh. And maybe a geography lesson for their staff wouldn't hurt either!
